title: 2024 AFL Grand Final Week – Wednesday 25 to Saturday 28 September 2024
articleContent:
Before you travel

We strongly encourage you to register your myki. With a registered myki you can protect your myki balance if the card is lost or stolen, check your travel history and manage multiple myki cards in the one account.

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.
articleText:
Before you travel
We strongly encourage you to register your myki. With a registered myki you can protect your myki balance if the card is lost or stolen, check your travel history and manage multiple myki cards in the one account.
Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.
articleDescription: Footy fever is upon us again as Melbourne gears up for the 2024 AFL Grand Final at the ‘G’. Footy fever is upon us again as Melbourne gears up for the 2024 AFL Grand Final at the ‘G’.
